definitions: Prepare (written material) for publication by correcting, condensing, or otherwise modifying it.
Supervise the publication of (a newspaper, magazine, or other periodical).
Prepare (film or tape) by cutting and rearranging sections.
Make changes to (data or a text) on a computer.
examples: The student will edit their essay before submission.
She edits a popular fashion magazine.
He spent hours editing the film footage.
You can edit the document directly online.
